reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Newest hotel in Boerne. Easy access to freeway and town. The room was very clean and quiet. Yes, there are houses very close, but unless you plan to keep your drapes open and run around the room naked, I don't see it to be a big problem. More of a problem for the homeowners, I would think. I would stay here again.
reviews.title: Nice, new, clean and quiet

reviews.text: My room looked right acroos a home's bedroom and bathroom. I don't think the hotel is more then 10 feet apart from the KB homes. Very bad location. Bad view, rooms where very plain. AC was very loud and got me up everytime it kicked on. The staff was almost never at the front desk. Not a very good experience from this hotel. Sorry. :(
reviews.title: Loud AC. Right next to homes. Bad location

reviews.text: This hotel did have a few problems, even though it is new. The A/C was loud and the temperature fluxuated quite a bit. The hot tub was not hot and there was no sign indicating any problems. We overheard the front desk telling someone that a pool person was coming out to fix it in a few days. There was a slight odor in the bathroom, but no leakage to be found. It seemed to go away once the A/C cooled the room enough. Breakfast was average, but the fruit on the last day was sour.
reviews.title: Too many other choices to stay here

likes.disliked: — Loud A/C with inconsistant cooling, hot tub not working

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was clean and the location not bad. However, it is on a one-way feeder just shy of being on the corner. You had to loop around to get to it, not the most convenient.
reviews.title: Don't stay here

reviews.text: With all the choices around, I would most likely not choose this hotel again.
reviews.title: Great Choice

reviews.text: The LaQuinta Inn & Suites opened about a month ago to my understanding. They made my day when they were able to offer our Company a good Corporate Rate that fit within my budget. They are located directly off IH-10 which is what I look for when traveling between Laredo & SAT.
reviews.title: New Hotel Opened In Boerne Texas..........Great Find!

likes.disliked: — That I didn't find it sooner
